restro.title: Restro - Productivity & Task Management Platform
restro.subtitle: Vue.js ‚Ä¢ Tailwind CSS ‚Ä¢ Alpine.js
restro.description: A modern productivity landing page designed to help teams increase efficiency and streamline task management. Built with Vue.js in just 2 days, featuring responsive design, smooth animations, and professional UI/UX.
restro.longDescription: Restro is a productivity-focused landing page that showcases a task management and collaboration platform. The website features a clean, modern design with a soft peach color scheme, compelling CTAs, social proof from major brands like Unsplash, Notion, and Grammarly, and comprehensive feature sections. Built rapidly with Vue.js, it demonstrates efficient component-based architecture, responsive layouts, and optimized performance for quick project delivery.

highlights.title: Rapid Development
highlights.description: Complete landing page built in 2 days

restro.developmentApproach: Rapid prototyping with Vue.js component system, utilizing Tailwind CSS for quick styling and Alpine.js for lightweight interactivity
